Summary: there were many flashing lights and it was very peculiar
divs: Sighting DetailsI was 7 years old at the time I was about to go to bed and I noticed some flashing lights outside of my window. I realized when I looked out my window that a street north west of me had a circular craft with a dome on top of it occupying it. when I first saw the object I believed it to be a UFO. it landed on that street for 3 min. and 20 sec. I ceased to look at it any longer because I was scared of it and when I looked back out the window it was gone.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lorain
There were no other sightings in Lorain on or around April 16th 2007
